subject: Baseball
Steroids
lead_paragraph: There was a one in 4,200 chance of Alex Rodriguez being randomly tested five times for performance-enhancing drugs, which is what would have happened if he was indeed tested at least seven times last season, as he said.
snippet: There was a one in 4,200 chance of Alex Rodriguez being randomly tested five times for performance-enhancing drugs, which is what would have happened if he was indeed tested at least seven times last season, as he said.
